author: Telegraph Staff
title: How will the dividend tax change affect you?
text: How will the dividend tax change affect you? Who pays more, who pays less and how can you reduce your bill? A change to how dividends are taxed featured in the 2015 Summer Budget. Photo: David Rose/The Daily Telegraph 9:00AM BST 18 Aug 2015
